trans-unit.source: A future update of Bloom will contain the branding assets for this project, “{0}”. Thank you for your patience.
trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced at runtime with the name of the new branding project.
trans-unit.target: A future update of Bloom will contain the branding assets for this project, “{0}”. Thank you for your patience.

trans-unit.source: Conversion file used:
trans-unit.note: After this text, the program will display the path to the conversion file (the location of the file on this computer). The conversion file specificies a mapping which is used to convert the script for one language into the script for another.
trans-unit.target: Conversion file used:

trans-unit.source: eSpeak failed.
trans-unit.note: This text is shown if an error occurred while running eSpeak. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).
trans-unit.target: eSpeak failed.

trans-unit.source: eSpeak language:
trans-unit.note: After this text, the program will display the language code of the language settings that eSpeak used. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).
trans-unit.target: eSpeak language:

trans-unit.source: Result of orthography conversion:
trans-unit.note: After this text, the program will display the text of the current text box after being converted into the script of another language using the settings in the conversion file.
trans-unit.target: Result of orthography conversion:

trans-unit.source: It looks like you are trying to open a Bloom Collection from inside of a ZIP file. You need to first unzip the ZIP file, and then open the collection.
trans-unit.target: It looks like you are trying to open a Bloom Collection from inside of a ZIP file. You need to first unzip the ZIP file, and then open the collection.

trans-unit.source: Bloom needs to verify your email, but our attempt to resend the request failed, possibly because you made too many requests too close together. Please check your email, and if you can't find the message, try again later.
trans-unit.target: Bloom needs to verify your email, but our attempt to resend the request failed, possibly because you made too many requests too close together. Please check your email, and if you can't find the message, try again later.

trans-unit.source: Funded by the local community only
trans-unit.target: Funded by the local community only

trans-unit.source: Check for updates
trans-unit.target: Check for updates

trans-unit.source: Expires:
trans-unit.target: Expires:

trans-unit.source: That code has expired.
trans-unit.target: That code has expired.

trans-unit.source: The code should look like SOMENAME-123456-7890
trans-unit.target: The code should look like SOMENAME-123456-7890

trans-unit.source: Learn More
trans-unit.target: Learn More

trans-unit.source: Bloom Enterprise adds features and services that are important for publishers, governments, and international organizations. This paid subscription meets their unique needs while supporting the development and user support of Bloom for the community at large.
trans-unit.target: Bloom Enterprise adds features and services that are important for publishers, governments, and international organizations. This paid subscription meets their unique needs while supporting the development and user support of Bloom for the community at large.

trans-unit.source: None. Enterprise features will be unavailable.
trans-unit.target: None. Enterprise features will be unavailable.

trans-unit.source: In an older version of Bloom, this project used **%0**. To continue to use this you will need to enter a current subscription code. Codes for SIL brandings can be found [here](%1). For other subscriptions, contact your project administrator.
trans-unit.note: %0 will be replaced with the name of the branding. Keep surrounding **...**. [here](%1) will become a hot link; %1 will not be seen, but will be the URL for the destination page. Translate "here" and keep the [](%1) around it.
trans-unit.target: In an older version of Bloom, this project used **%0**. To continue to use this you will need to enter a current subscription code. Codes for SIL brandings can be found [here](%1). For other subscriptions, contact your project administrator.

trans-unit.source: That code appears to be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: That code appears to be incorrect.

trans-unit.target: Bloom Enterprise Status

trans-unit.target: Enterprise Subscription

trans-unit.target: Subscription Code:

trans-unit.target: This version of Bloom does not have the artwork that goes with that subscription.

trans-unit.target: Export warning: Found differing 'src' attribute and element text for data-div element {0}. The 'src' attribute will be ignored.

trans-unit.target: Export failed:

trans-unit.target: Bloom could not write to the spreadsheet because another program has it locked. Do you have it open in another program?
